page.title: 16Recreation in Barnt Green
page.content: The people of Barnt Green, Cofton Hackett and Hopwood have many {recreational facilities}which are open to them. There is fishing on the Bittell reservoirs and Birmingham-Worcester canal; sailing on the Upper Bittell reservoir; cricket at the Barnt Green Cricket Club; squash, tennis badminton and soccer at Barnt Green Sports Club. There are W.I's, a Local History Society and a growing Theatrical Society within the village. adults have a variety of options available to them. Children are members of the local Scounts or Guides, they can have music and ballet lessons and all the sports clubs in the area offer coaching facilities for younger members.
